title: R Files for Data Science Lessons

Here, you can find R code files for each lesson we have on this website. Each file is in a .zip format. We recommend you download and open the files using [Rstudio desktop](https://posit.co/download/rstudio-desktop/) or [posit.cloud](https://posit.cloud/content/yours?sort=name_asc).
